scripts.build: npm run build-outline && npm run build-filled && npm run build-react && npm run build-vue && npm run build-react-native
scripts.test-react: cp ./data/icons.json ./tests/react-test/src/icons.json && cd tests/react-test && npm i && npm run start
scripts.test-vue: cp ./data/icons.json ./tests/vue-test/src/icons.json && cd tests/vue-test && npm i && npm run serve
scripts.test-react-native: cp ./data/icons.json ./tests/react-native-test/icons.json && cd ./react-native && npm pack && mv bitcoin-design-*.tgz bitcoin-icons-react-native.tgz && cd ../tests/react-native-test && npm i && npm run start
scripts.compile-react-native: rimraf react-native/filled && rimraf react-native/outline && node scripts/compile-react-native/compile-react-native.js && tsc -p scripts/generate-type-declarations/tsconfig.json --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir ./react-native && cp react-native/filled/*.d.ts react-native/filled/esm && cp react-native/outline/*.d.ts react-native/outline/esm
scripts.build-react-native: npm run gen-react-comps && npm run compile-react-native && rimraf ./tmp-react-comps
